								[1724] rowheader 'What does this product do?'
									StaticText 'What does this product do?'
								[1726] cell 'Stops chafing, rash, raw skin, irritation caused by rubbing.'
									StaticText 'Stops chafing, rash, raw skin, irritation caused by rubbing.'
								[1728] cell 'Added ingredients help keep skin soft, moisturized, and free from irritation and chafing caused by rubbing.'
									StaticText 'Added ingredients help keep skin soft, moisturized, and free from irritation and chafing caused by rubbing.'
								[1730] cell 'For toes, feet, and ankles. Protects against hot spots, blisters from rubbing, while helping with inflammation.'
									StaticText 'For toes, feet, and ankles. Protects against hot spots, blisters from rubbing, while helping with inflammation.'
								[1732] cell 'Unique cream becomes silky-soft, soothes, hydrates and protects against dry, chapped, chafed and raw skin from rubbing.'
									StaticText 'Unique cream becomes silky-soft, soothes, hydrates and protects against dry, chapped, chafed and raw skin from rubbing.'

									StaticText 'What do these ingredients do?'
								[1759] cell 'Minimize rubbing and friction that causes irritation, rash, chafing and raw skin'
									StaticText 'Minimize rubbing and friction that causes irritation, rash, chafing and raw skin'

									StaticText 'Where should I use this product?'

									StaticText 'Thighs, chest, arms, feet, and places where skin rubs skin'
								[1772] cell 'Use with bras, on thighs, the underside of arms, and skin creases and folds'
									StaticText 'Use with bras, on thighs, the underside of arms, and skin creases and folds'

								[1779] rowheader 'When should I apply this product?'
									StaticText 'When should I apply this product?'
								[1781] cell 'Before activity to protect your skin from chafing and rubbing. Great for daily use.'
									StaticText 'Before activity to protect your skin from chafing and rubbing. Great for daily use.'
								[1783] cell 'Before activity to moisturize and protect your skin from chafing and rubbing. Great for daily use.'

				[1807] image '', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/mg/f25f5fef-af0e-405f-8e3c-3bd86376f219._SR300,300_.jpg'
				[1810] heading 'Prevention is Better than a Cure'
				[1811] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Problems solved: Each formula is a time-tested, trusted solution – an invisible, dry and protective barrier made with natural ingredients that stay where needed mess-free on the surface of your skin, repelling water and moisture, while letting skin breathe and sweat escape.'
				[1812] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'We use: Clean, plant-derived ingredients that are not tested on animals, hypoallergenic, skin safe, and kid safe, too.'
				[1813] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'We do not use: Old school ingredients – no petroleum, no lanolin, no mineral or vegetable oils that sit on the top of the skin, slide around, and need frequent reapplication. We do not use animal products or test on animals.'
				[1826] image '', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/mg/082ed336-7f47-468a-819b-9436a908e44a._SR300,300_.jpg'
				[1829] heading 'Born among surfers under the California sun'
				[1830] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Body Glide was made to shoot the curl with glorious abandon, to run beaches and bike coasts, to climb mountains, to hike wherever our hearts desire – to be free and confident, now and forever.'
				[1831] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'From the start in the ‘90s, we invented and revolutionized protective solutions to rubbing and friction that cause rash, irritation, blisters, chafing, and painfully raw skin.'
				[1832] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Our unique technology is time-tested and trusted for superior comfort and confidence regardless of your size, weight or build – to help get you into shape or through your day, to work, to walk, run, swim, cycle, compete in sports or pursue outdoor activities – to be protected from skin irritation and injury, head to toe.'
				[1833] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Body Glide has attracted a loyal following of people around the world, inspired to walk a block, hike a trail, climb a hill, swim an ocean, to keep going at work or play, near and far – to ride the waves of life free of fear, free of pain, and free to be the brave hero they want to be.'
				[1846] image '', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media/mg/8418aafd-3921-482a-96c6-c8b65c10eff8._SR970,300_.jpg'
				[1857] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1860] list ''
					[1861] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Apply before you get dressed, on thighs, neck, arms, and anywhere skin is RUBBED. Stop trouble before it starts'
					[1863] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Made with allergen free, plant-derived ingredients. Vegan approved, never tested on animals. Child safe'
					[1865] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'The preferred choice over messy, wet creams, gels and powders. No petroleum, lanolin or mineral oils'
					[1867] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Effective and long-lasting. Use daily in humid and Dry conditions for a pain free active life'
					[1869] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Keeps pores clog free. Sweat escapes and lets skin breathe. Clothing, footware and wetsuit safe'
				[1872] table ''

						[1886] row ''
							[1887] rowheader 'Brand Name'
							[1888] cell '\u200eBodyGlide'
						[1889] row ''
							[1890] rowheader 'Warranty Description'
							[1891] cell '\u200eBody Glide cares about quality. We warrant our products to be free of manufacturing defects when purchased from Body Glide or an authorized Body Glide dealer. In these cases, please call Body Glide at 425-467-6580 and have the following information available: Name of the Seller (not just a marketplace website such as Amazon) Product Name and Size Date of Purchase Purchase Price Lot/Batch code printed on the bottom of the product tube Expiration date printed on the bottom of the product tube If purchased from an authorized Body Glide reseller, to receive a refund or replacement you will need to return the original container and unused portion of the product to Body Glide with a return merchandise authorization number and a copy of the original purchase receipt. If the product was not purchased from an authorized Body Glide reseller, Body Glide cannot warrant the condition of the product, how it was shipped or stored. Consequently, the warranty does not cover: Products purchased other than from Body Glide or an authorized Body Glide dealer. Products that have passed their expiration date. Damage from storing the product contrary to directions on the packaging. Products purchased or delivered outside the country designated on the package. Products that have been tampered with or modified.'
						[1892] row ''

step_data.thought:
I can see I'm now on the Body Glide Original Anti-Chafe Balm product page. The goal was simply to look at this product, which I have successfully accomplished. The page displays all the product details including:
1. The product name and images
2. Price ($29.98)
3. Different style options (0.80oz, 1.5-Ounce, 1.5oz 2 Pack, 2.5oz, 2.5oz Pack of 2)
4. Product description and details
5. Features and specifications

Since the goal was just to look at the product page and I'm now viewing it, I should let the user know that I've completed the task.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully navigated to the Body Glide Original Anti-Chafe Balm product page. The product is available for $29.98 and comes in various sizes including 0.80oz, 1.5-Ounce, 1.5oz 2 Pack, 2.5oz, and 2.5oz Pack of 2. The page displays product images, description, and detailed information about this anti-chafe balm.')
